title: MapControl requires a MapServiceToken even for custom tile sources
body: MapControl has some nice extensibility options but requires specifying a token even if you're using local or custom tile sources as the background replacement layer.

comments.body: In addition even if you disable the base layer (with MapStyle=None, MapTileSource Layer=BackgroundReplacement) you get the "(C) Microsoft Corporation" watermark, which is flat out wrong.
